question: My husband has had three heart attacks as well as congestive heart failure, diabetes, Hepatitis C.  He is currently taking Novolin Insulin 70/30, Atenolol, Trazadone, Hydroxyzine, Gabapentin, Ecotrin enteric coated aspirin, Zetia, Fluoxetine, Plavic, Centrum Multivitamin, Albuterol Inhaler, and Nitroglycerin.  Would any of these medications reveal a false positive for PCP in a urine test?
title: False positive urine test
